alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Emanuel, north central Toombs, Treutlen, south central Johnson and northern Montgomery Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Blackville, or near Soperton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Soperton, Adrian, Oak Park, Nunez, Tarrytown, Lothair, Covena, Orland, Orianna, Norristown, Kibbee, Norristown Junction, Lexsy, Blackville, Zaidee and Gillis Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
